##Student Performance on Mapped Inidicators

###Graduate Attribute: Problem Analysis

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot.title = 'CIVL-4-PA-Gx'
plot.subtitle = 'Calculate one-dimensional advective flow through natural and engineered layered systems'

ggplot(civl.4.pa.gx, aes(x = `CIVL-4-PA-Gx`)) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(fill=`CIVL-4-PA-Gx`)) + 
  ylab("Count") + 
  ggtitle(bquote(atop(.(plot.title), atop(italic(.(plot.subtitle)), "")))) +
  xlab("Performance") + 
  xlim(civl.levels) +
  theme_hc() +
  theme(legend.position="none") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 0, vjust = 0)) +
  theme(text = element_text(size=12))
```

The development of this indicator over time would be:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot.title = 'CIVL-4-IN-Gx2 Over time'
plot.subtitle = 'Calculate contaminant impact on receptor aquifer from waste containment facility'

ggplot(time.gax2, aes(x = indicator)) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(fill= indicator)) + 
  facet_wrap(~rubric, scales = "fixed", ncol=3) +
  ylab("Count") + 
  ggtitle(bquote(atop(.(plot.title), atop(italic(.(plot.subtitle)), "")))) +
  xlab("Performance") + 
  xlim(civl.levels) +
  theme_hc() +
  theme(legend.position="none") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 0, vjust = 0)) +
  theme(text = element_text(size=12))
```
